mdRecord.dcterms:title: A new map of South Carolina: with its canals, roads & distances from place to place along the stage & steam boat routes
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Burroughs, H. N.
Mitchell, S. Augustus (Samuel Augustus), 1792-1868
mdRecord.dcterms:description: "Entered according to Act of Congress, in the year 1846, by H.N. Burroughs, in the Clerks Office of the Eastern District of Pennsylvania."
Inset tables: References to Charleston; Charleston to Savannah; Steam Boat Routes Savannah to Augusta.
No. "19" printed at lower right corner of map.
Explanation: Canals, Rail roads, State Capital, County Towns Common Do., Leading Roads
Note: The Land distances from Town to Town are noted along the Roads thus...
Published in: A New Universal Atlas Containing Maps of the various Empires.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Extensive figuring on verso, with signature of R.W. (or R.M.) Jones. Tracy W. McGregor Library, American History Collection.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: South Carolina--Maps
Southern States--Maps
